settings.title: About yeedi
settings.text:
Headquartered in China’s
Silicon Valley, Shenzhen, yeedi is an up-and-coming robot vacuums brand founded in 2019. Developed by a group of robotic and housekeeping experts who are passionate about life and keen on innovations, our robot vacuums with modern design and practical features work seamlessly in different homes to save you from arduous floor cleaning chores.

settings.title: Our Team
settings.text: yeedi is a company with strong background of R&D, design, production, manufacturing and sales. With more than 20 years of experience in smart home robotics, our team knows what it takes to make a reliable robot vacuum and keeps perfecting it so you can get more time focusing on what really matters.

settings.subtitle: Design That Speaks for Itself
settings.title: Our Design Concept
settings.text: Believing function and aesthetics can coexist, we break the stereotype of robot vacuums with a simple but modern design. Now your reliable floor cleaning buddy can also be an exquisite piece of art that brings your home décor up a notch.

settings.title: Rapid Growth
settings.text: yeedi expands rapidly into global markets and has been the go-to floor cleaning solution of thousands of families in 14 countries, including the United States, Canada, Germany, France, Italy, Spain, Poland, Turkey, Russia, Indonesia, Singapore, alaysia, Japan, China

Oct, 2019

yeedi is established by a team with over 20 years of experience in smart home robotics.

 

Feb, 2020

yeedi launched its first robot vacuum, yeedi k600. This mode instantly became the best-selling robot vacuum on Amazon and was featured as the best budget RVC in Reviewed, SPY, Digital Trends, TechHive and more.

 

Mar, 2020

yeedi expanded to US market growing into the top 10 brands on Amazon within 4 months.

 

Sept, 2020

yeedi launched another of its best-selling robot vacuum, yeedi k650. It is awarded as the best RVC for pet hair by Digital Trends, Wired, PCMag and more. 

 

Oct, 2020

yeedi is available in EMEA market and ranked top 6 during Black Friday promotion in Germany in 2020.

 

Apr. 2021

yeedi’s self-empty robot vacuum & mop, yeedi vac station won the prestigious reddot design award.

 

July, 2021

yeedi’s self-empty robot vacuum & mop, yeedi vac station went viral on social and ranked No. 1 on Amazon’s new release list on its launch day.
